findings.title: Incorrect total pool reward allocation calculation in KrStaking contract
findings.description: The `setPool` function in the `KrStaking` contract incorrectly calculates `totalAllocPoint` by adding the old pool allocation to the new allocation and then subtracting the result from the total allocation, which can cause underflow errors.

findings.title: Unnecessary swapping of array values in KrStaking.sol
findings.description: In the function on line 145, unnecessary swapping of array values occurs between rewards.tokens and pool.rewardTokens which reference the same array.

findings.title: Action totalSupply accounting differences between
findings.description: The issue arises when users deposit and then withdraw (or mint and redeem) issued anchor assets directly through the Vault, resulting in receiving fewer assets than initially deposited due to incorrect `totalSupply` and `totalAssets` accounting.
